title: Seafood Chowder
ingredients: 1 (23 ounce) can fat-free condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, undrained
1 ½ cups potatoes, chopped into small cubes
method: Step 2: Combine cream cheese, 1/2 cup milk, and garlic in a large pot over low heat; cook and stir until blended, about 3 minutes.
Step 3: Mix in condensed soup, undrained corn, remaining 1 cup milk, potatoes, green onions, carrots, parsley, black pepper, and cayenne pepper.
Step 4: Simmer for 25 minutes, stirring occasionally, without letting the chowder boil.
Step 5: Add shrimp, scallops, crab, calamari, and clams; cook until seafood is opaque, about 10 minutes.
